Quad ¶
Source

Quad :: struct #packed {
	tl: Vertex,
	tr: Vertex,
	br: Vertex,
	bl: Vertex,
}

Vertex :: struct {
	v: [3]f32,
	c: [4]u8,
}

draw_segs_quad_buffer ¶
Source

draw_segs_quad_buffer :: proc "odin" (
	x, y:         f32, 
	segs:         []u8, 
	vertical:     bool, 
	c:            [4]u8, 
	buf:          []Quad, 
	start_offset: int, 
	scale:        f32 = f32(1.0), 
) -> (quads: int) {…}
 

Same memory layout, but takes a []quad instead of []byte

) -> (offset: int) {…}
